quotation: Life would be infinitely happier if we could only be born at the age of eighty and gradually approach eighteen.
author: Mark Twain

quotation: If you wish to bake an apple pie from scratch, you must first invent the universe.
author: Carl Sagan

quotation: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
author: Bill Gates

quotation: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
author: Dr. Seuss

quotation: Physics is like sex: sure, it may give some practical results, but that’s not why we do it.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quotation: For once you have tasted flight, you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return.
author: Lonardo da Vinci

quotation: The most formidable weapon against errors of any kind is reason.
author: Thomas Paine

quotation: Every sunset brings the promise of a new dawn.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotation: One of the most important keys to success is having the discipline to do what you know you should do, even when you don't feel like doing it.
author: Lewis Howes

quotation: I learned a long time ago that the wisest thing I can do is be on my own side.
author: Maya Angelou
